title: TRX Price Eyes $0.37: Tron Blockchain Fuels Stablecoin Boom in 2025
description: October 9, 2025 – With a crypto market that is still trying to figure out where to turn after recent market fluctuations, Tron (TRX) is showing itself as a dependable workhorse, attracting new investment from both institutional and retail investors.
